title: Axe
description: An axe with a wooden handle and a metal blade. On many platforms the blade is red, like a fire axe.
apple_vendor_description: The axe emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a sturdy, dark brown wooden handle and a gleaming, silver-gray metallic head, showcasing Apple's commitment to detailed realism. Its sharp edge is subtly highlighted, and the overall shape is given a satisfying 3D depth through glossy shading and precise lighting. This emoji can symbolize strength, hard work, chopping, or even a more metaphorical cutting through challenges, often used in contexts related to manual labor or decisive action on Apple devices.
